content.text: Who to Call (In Order)
1. Highways England (FREE - Call First)
**Phone:** 0300 123 5000 (24/7, free from mobiles)
They will:

items: Locate you using marker posts
Send traffic officers to make you safe
Arrange FREE recovery to nearest exit (motorway only)
Set up cones/barriers to protect your vehicle

2. Your Breakdown Cover (If You Have It)

content.text: If you have breakdown cover, they'll recover you from the exit to garage/home at no extra cost (usually).
3. Local Recovery Service (If No Breakdown Cover)
Search 'vehicle recovery near me' or call a local recovery firm. Expect to pay Â£80-Â£250 depending on distance.

content.text: Smart Motorways (No Hard Shoulder)
If you break down on a smart motorway (M6, M42 sections):

items: Get to an **Emergency Refuge Area (ERA)** if possible (every 1.5 miles, orange SOS signs)
If you can't reach ERA, move to leftmost lane, hazards on
Call 999 immediately (smart motorways = higher danger)
Press the SOS button if at ERA
Cameras should detect you within 60 seconds (Highways dispatches help)
